title: Cold showers boost immune systems and increase energy levels, study shows
description: Wim Hof, star of BBC programme Freeze the Fear, says a cold shower a day decreases stress and increases energy levels. A scientist explains whether he is right.
cleaned_text: boost immune systems and increase energy levels, study shows Cold water immersion has been found to increase circulation and is thought to have mental health benefits.
